Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UCertdbUserDAO
public interface UserDAO
A UserDAO is a Data Access Object with the needed methods to interact with User data
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<User> findAllUsers()
    Gets all Users from the data source
    User findUser​(java.lang.String name)
    Gets the data from the data source for the User with the userName name
    java.lang.Boolean isCorrectPassword​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass)
    Verifies if the user-inputted password is the same password stored in the data source related to the User with userName name

  • Method Details

    • findUser

      User findUser​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the data from the data source for the User with the userName name
      Parameters:
      name - the userName of the User to search the data source for
      Returns:
      the User object with the data of the User with userName name

    • findAllUsers

      java.util.ArrayList<User> findAllUsers()
      Gets all Users from the data source
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all User objects from the data source

    • isCorrectPassword

      java.lang.Boolean isCorrectPassword​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass)
      Verifies if the user-inputted password is the same password stored in the data source related to the User with userName name
      Parameters:
      name - the userName of the User to compare passwords
      pass - the user-inputted password to compare to the data source password
      Returns:
      true if the passwords match, false if the passwords are not the same
